repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This manuscript contains Anumānakhaṇḍa of the Tattvacintāmaṇi with the commentaries Dīdhiti and Gādādharī. First blank folio looks younger than the other folio seems later added.

msItem.title: Anumānakhaṇḍa - Tattvacintāmaṇi with Dīdhiti and Gādādharī
msItem.author: Gaṅgeśa Upādhyāya:Raghunātha Śiromaṇi and Gadādhara Bhaṭṭācārya

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 08 p:19-34 VOHD II.7. p938: entry 2802

msItem.incipit: 1v 1 atha samanvitaye niṃulaṃ vyadhikaraṇadharmmāvacchinnavṛttiyogitākābhāva vyupagama eva saṃgacchate tādṛśābhā 1v 2 vaṃ ? rūpagame sarvatra tadabhāvavati hetor vṛtterasaṃbhavaḥ sādhyābhāvavadvṛttitvasya tādṛśābhāvamādāya lakṣaṇasaṃgamane sarvatra vyabhicāriṇvativyā 1v 3 ptiriti lakṣaṇapariṣkārāsaṃbhavena saundalamamavalaṃbyalakṣaṇāt idṛśa śaṃkā na saṃgacchate iti ced ….
msItem.explicit: 144v 5 tatra viśeṣyadalaṃ avṛttihetukātivyāptivāraṇaparamiti yathāvaśruta vyākhyānaṃ na ?? āvyutto sādhyādhikaraṇā 144v 6 vṛttitvasarvāt . .. śūbamastu .. śrīhayagrīvāya namaḥ . śrīmate śrīnivaasabrahmatantravarakāla?deśikāyanamaḥ śrī śrī śrī śri
msItem.colophon: 144v 7 pramodūta caitra kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ racanā śvit? 144v 8 caturdaśalakṣaṇī

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin.
supportDesc.condition: good with some black dots on some folio.

additions.desc: On 1v in the left margin : hariḥ oṃ śubamastu

listBibl.bibl: Tattvacintāmani Didhīti prakāśa by Bhavananda Siddhantavagisa Bhattacaryya, Gaṅgeśa, Gurucaraṇa Vol. 1-4 , Asiatic Society of Bengal Sanskrit Press, Calcutta 1910-1912 Caturdaśalakṣaṇī : Dīdhiti with Gādādharī and the sub-commentaries Kṛṣṇaṃbhaṭṭīya and Nyāyaratna, N. Santanam Aiyar, Raghunātha Śiromaṇi., Gadādharabhaṭṭācārya, Kṛṣṇambhaṭṭa, Paṭṭābhirāmaśāstrī,Raghunātha Śāstrī Parvatīkara Adyar Library and Research Centre, Madras 1986

encodingDesc.p: Space is added to separate words.
